attributes.action: Council Tax break to help people  who can't work due to covid-19 virus
attributes.additional_details: Because we can't pay our bills due to covid - 19 virus outbreaks
attributes.background: We are in difficult times to pay our bills and mortgage due to covid-19 we would really appreciate if you could help with 3 months council tax help , so people can restart to pay when there is abnormality

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
